channel.title: 🏢 University of Michigan on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Michigan on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: GPS as a Control Signal for Image Generation
item.description: GPS-guided image generation is here! This paper leverages GPS data to create highly realistic images reflecting specific locations, even reconstructing 3D models from 2D photos.

item.title: Teaching Embodied Reinforcement Learning Agents: Informativeness and Diversity of Language Use
item.description: Teaching AI agents with diverse and informative language feedback dramatically improves their learning, generalization, and adaptability.
